item.title: Set Up your Development Environment
item.description: Choosing a programming language Choosing a programming language is the first and perhaps the most crucial step in the learning process. Several factors to consider when selecting a language include: Purpose: What do you want to code for? If it’s web development, JavaScript or PHP might be good options. If you’re into data science, R or Python might be more appropriate. Community: A language with an active community can be vital for beginners.
